bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a chronic sadness with weeping that does not end by itself, and is brought forth by hearing someone else weep, or develops spontaneously out of one’s own weeping. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 17: 治哭疰方：梳齒間刮取垢，水服之 , “Recipe for treating weeping [demon’s] attachment-illness : scratch the filth from between the teeth of a comb, and consume this with water”.
